Oviedo Bar - Lazy Gator Bar - The Black Hammock Skip to content The Orlando Area’s Premier Airboat Ride & Restaurant Destination 407-365-1244 BOOK AN AIRBOAT RIDE Boat Tours Orlando Airboat Rides – Packages Lodging Food and Drinks Menu Lazy Gator Bar Restaurant Specials Special Event Explore Gift Shop Explore Natural Florida Groups and Events Banquet Room Community Upcoming Events Blog Contact Us Boat Tours Orlando Airboat Rides – Packages Lodging Food and Drinks Menu Lazy Gator Bar Restaurant Specials Special Event Explore Gift Shop Explore Natural Florida Groups and Events Banquet Room Community Upcoming Events Blog Contact Us BOOK AN AIRBOAT RIDE​ BOOK NOW Lazy Gator Bar View Event Calendar 2-4-1 MARGARITAS - ALL DAY, EVERYDAY! Live Music- Every Friday and Saturday from 8PM to 11PM Bingo – Every Wednesday at 7:30pm Text to reserve your spot 407-365-1244 Karaoke – Every Thursday at 8pm – First time singer gets a free drink Text to reserve your spot 407-365-1244 Come For Delicious Drinks. Stay For The Breath-Taking Sunsets. The Lazy Gator Bar is part of our exciting lakeside attraction located on Lake Jesup. If you’re looking for a place to relax, have an ice-cold brew and enjoy a spectacular view of the lake, then look no further than our revamped Oviedo bar! “The lakeside environment of Black Hammock scream “Old Florida” loud and clear: With its moss-covered cypress trees, airboat tours, and alligator exhibits, this bar is all about being at one with nature while having a good time. It’s one of those laid-back places with a “come as you are” vibe.” Orlando Weekly Planning a birthday party? Group airboat rides for parties of 12 or more starting at $25.95/person Buffet options starting at $10.99/person Rent the Restaurant Patio, Deck Bar, VIP section, or Tiki Terrace. Prices start at $200 Email Info@TheBlackHammock.com or call 407-365-1244 x4 for more information. Order our FAMOUS Gator Bites from our bar menu and many other delicious items to choose from. All bar menu items are catered to go from our restaurant. Check out the Calendar to see which bands and DJs are playing at the Black Hammock this month! Country Singer Jake Owen’s 8 Second Ride music video was filmed on location at the Lazy Gator Bar. Jake Owen won the 2009 ACM Top New Male Vocalist Award and the 2012 American Country Awards Breakthrough Artist of the Year! PLANNING A SPECIAL PARTY OR CORPORATE EVENT? Book an Event Take Advantage Of These Specials! Book Your Next Event With Us! Karaoke Night Bingo Night Live Music PLANNING A SPECIAL PARTY OR CORPORATE EVENT? Book an Event The Lazy Gator Hours of Operation The Main Bar 3:00pm – 10:30pm Tuesday – Thurs 11:00am – 1:00am Friday & Saturday 11:00am – 10:30pm Sunday The Deck Bar Available Tuesday – Sunday for private party rental.
